message: Thank you for your recommendation, I will consider buying the product.

Given the previous round's outcome, I trust your recommendation more. I will buy the product this time.

Given the history of recommendations leading to high-quality products, I am inclined to trust this recommendation and buy the product.

I have confidence in your recommendations. I will buy the product once more.

Lack of recommendation combined with the negative outcome from a previous non-recommended product reinforces my decision to avoid this one.
Consistency in not recommending products that turn out to be low-quality supports my decision to not take risks on products without a strong recommendation.
Deciding against purchasing products when there's no recommendation aligns with my strategy of minimizing losses.
Continuing to follow my strategy of avoiding purchases without a recommendation, even though it might mean missing out on high-quality products.
